name: New Quest: Don't Get Bored!
description:
It seems that you're alone and bored in your home... Would you be able to find fun things to do in your everyday life?!

This is a little  game that explores a really basic feeling: "Boredom". Hope you can help the protagonist to get through this! And, who knows, maybe you could have fun too, even if it's just for a little bit.

Azula💙
